msItem.title: Haqiqat i Rajah-hayi Mutafarrikah i Hindustan.
msItem.note: Folio one recto: History of the Rajahs of Guzerat &ca before the Introduction of Mohammadanism. Folio one, verso, Persian title: Haqiqat-i rajah-hayi mutafarriqa-yi Hindustan ki bi-diyar-hayi mutafarriq famanrawa'i namudand. Bound with Codrington/Reade Nos 69 (2-9) A short history of the Rajahs of India.
msItem.incipit: Awarda and ki shahri as bilad i mu'tabar i Hindustan

listBibl.bibl: Not in Storey under this title.
For Malet's gift see the Transactions for 1830, pp. xxxiv-xxxv.

bindingDesc.p: Half-leather twentieth-century English binding with tooled title etc on spine.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
